title: (x) Sons of Thunder - Copperplate Gothic (customized) {Stephen}
content:
need your expert help in identifying this font   
   
 ![sons of thunder](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123003019im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23059.jpg)
author: negood

comments.content:
good suggestions Stephen.   
   
I don't think it's for sale yet but   
WAKEROBIN from Carl Crossgrove   
is also in the same genre.   
   
 [http://www.terrestrialdesign.com/typefram.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123003019/http:/www.terrestrialdesign.com/typefram.html)

hey type fans ... I contacted the guy who did the Sons of Thunder t shirt design ... and he said it was BonJovi and CopperPlate Gothic Condensed ... but my version of BonJovi has a very wide U and O ... any further ideas other than it is a custom tweak.
